sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import Navbar from '../components/navbar.js'; import Footer from '../components/footer.js'; export default class AssetPool extends React.Component { render() { return (

Interest Asset Pool

Join the pool and vote on which crypto asset the Consortium will use to purchase and auction.

Interest Pool Protocol

Interest from pooled DIA is used to purchase high value Crypto Assets.

Interest Loan Protocol

Users choose to fund loans with the interest by the Consortium and borrowers use Crypto Assets as collateral.

Loan Funding Protocol

Individuals choose to fund a portion or all of a borrowers loan request. The borrower uses a Crypto Asset as collateral.

Compound Interest Protocol

Users deposit their DIA and the interest earned is used to automatically swapped for ETH at set intervals. At the end of a quarterly cycle ETH is swapped back for DIA

); } }
